summary.title: StellarPay Threat Model
summary.description: StellarPay is a secure web-based digital banking application that allows users to register, link bank cards, send and receive money, make online payments, and manage their transactions. The app includes a frontend interface, backend server, multiple databases, and connects to third-party APIs like banks and merchants.

diagrams.title: StellarPay System Architecture
diagrams.description: Diagram showing the components and data flows in the StellarPay digital banking platform
